channel.title: Christianity Amp Parenthood on Amalgamated Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Christianity Amp Parenthood on Amalgamated Thoughts

item.title: Revisited: Blog changes, etc.
item.description: I’ve once more moved my blog. This time, it’s on my own hosting account and it’s back to using WP. Same blog, different flavor now and moving forward. I’ve had this short discussion with a co-leader in church on going back to blogging, and he pointed out the importance of identifying to a particular niche. I said sure, it’s important, but I think I wouldn’t want to separate my technical gibberish from my thoughts and reflections on God and Christianity.
